text: Pilsener may refer to: * anything from the town of Plzeň or Pilsen * Pilsner, a type of beer ** Beer glassware#Pilsner glass, a variety of beer glass ** Mash ingredients#Pilsner malt, a type of brewing malt ** Prohibition_in_Iceland#Pre-abolition, non-alcoholic beer in Iceland during prohibition, usually mixed in such drinks as bjórlíki, a legal beer substitute
title: Pilsener (disambiguation)
